languages.text: "Почему нет? Ты оступил{mf|ся|ась} передо мной. Тебе надо загладить проступок. Я требую столь простую вещь — одну жертву из круга тех, кто тебе дорог. Я развлекусь и, быть может, забуду обиду. В моих глазах... цена невелика".

"Why not? You have failed to appreciate what I have offered you. You must make amends for your transgression. My request is very simple — a sacrifice from your inner circle. I will have my fun and, perhaps, forget your offence. To me... it is a small price to pay."
languages.original_text: "Почему нет? Ты оступил{mf|ся|ась} передо мной. Тебе надо загладить проступок. Я требую столь простую вещь — одну жертву из круга тех, кто тебе дорог. Я развлекусь и, быть может, забуду обиду. В моих глазах... цена невелика".

traits.locale_text: "Why not? You have failed to appreciate what I have offered you. You must make amends for your transgression. My request is very simple — a sacrifice from your inner circle. I will have my fun and, perhaps, forget your offence. To me... it is a small price to pay."

"Why not? You have failed to appreciate what I have offered you. You must make amends for your transgression. My request is very simple — a sacrifice from your inner circle. I will have my fun and, perhaps, forget your offence. To me... it is a small price to pay."

"Why not? You have failed to appreciate what I have offered you. You must make amends for your transgression. My request is very simple — a sacrifice from your inner circle. I will have my fun and, perhaps, forget your offence. To me... it is a small price to pay."

"Why not? You have failed to appreciate what I have offered you. You must make amends for your transgression. My request is very simple — a sacrifice from your inner circle. I will have my fun and, perhaps, forget your offence. To me... it is a small price to pay."

languages.text: «¿Por qué no? No has sabido apreciar lo que te ofrecía. Debes pagar por tu transgresión. Mi solicitud es sencilla: el sacrificio de alguien de tu círculo interior. Yo pasaré un buen rato y tal vez olvide tu ofensa. Yo diría... que es un pequeño precio a pagar».
languages.original_text: "Why not? You have failed to appreciate what I have offered you. You must make amends for your transgression. My request is very simple — a sacrifice from your inner circle. I will have my fun and, perhaps, forget your offence. To me... it is a small price to pay."

traits.locale_text: «¿Por qué no? No has sabido apreciar lo que te ofrecía. Debes pagar por tu transgresión. Mi solicitud es sencilla: el sacrificio de alguien de tu círculo interior. Yo pasaré un buen rato y tal vez olvide tu ofensa. Yo diría... que es un pequeño precio a pagar».

languages.text: 「何が問題なんだ？ お前は俺が与えたものの意味をまったく理解してない。犯した罪は償う必要がある。俺の要求はただひとつ―従者のひとりを差し出せ。俺は楽しめるし、お前が犯した罪を忘れやることができるかもしれない。小さな代償だと思うがね…」
languages.original_text: "Why not? You have failed to appreciate what I have offered you. You must make amends for your transgression. My request is very simple — a sacrifice from your inner circle. I will have my fun and, perhaps, forget your offence. To me... it is a small price to pay."

traits.locale_text: 「何が問題なんだ？ お前は俺が与えたものの意味をまったく理解してない。犯した罪は償う必要がある。俺の要求はただひとつ―従者のひとりを差し出せ。俺は楽しめるし、お前が犯した罪を忘れやることができるかもしれない。小さな代償だと思うがね…」

languages.text: “为什么不呢？既然你拒绝了我的好意，那就必须为你的逾矩作出补偿。我的要求很简单，把你的一名亲信献祭给我。只要我玩得开心，或许就会忘记你的冒犯。这对来你说……只是个小小的代价。”
languages.original_text: "Why not? You have failed to appreciate what I have offered you. You must make amends for your transgression. My request is very simple — a sacrifice from your inner circle. I will have my fun and, perhaps, forget your offence. To me... it is a small price to pay."

traits.locale_text: “为什么不呢？既然你拒绝了我的好意，那就必须为你的逾矩作出补偿。我的要求很简单，把你的一名亲信献祭给我。只要我玩得开心，或许就会忘记你的冒犯。这对来你说……只是个小小的代价。”

languages.text: « Pourquoi pas ? Vous n'avez pas su apprécier ce que je vous ai offert. Vous devez faire amende honorable pour votre transgression. Ma demande est simple : le sacrifie d'un membre de votre entourage. Ça me divertira et m'aidera peut-être à oublier votre faute. Ça ne me semble pas si cher payé. »
languages.original_text: "Why not? You have failed to appreciate what I have offered you. You must make amends for your transgression. My request is very simple — a sacrifice from your inner circle. I will have my fun and, perhaps, forget your offence. To me... it is a small price to pay."

traits.locale_text: « Pourquoi pas ? Vous n'avez pas su apprécier ce que je vous ai offert. Vous devez faire amende honorable pour votre transgression. Ma demande est simple : le sacrifie d'un membre de votre entourage. Ça me divertira et m'aidera peut-être à oublier votre faute. Ça ne me semble pas si cher payé. »

languages.text: "Warum nicht? Ihr wusstet nicht zu schätzen, was ich Euch angeboten habe. Für diesen Affront müsst Ihr büßen. Meine Bitte ist simpel — ein Opfer aus Eurem innersten Kreis. Ich werde meinen Spaß haben und Eure Beleidigung vielleicht vergessen. Für mich ... ist das ein kleiner Preis."
languages.original_text: "Why not? You have failed to appreciate what I have offered you. You must make amends for your transgression. My request is very simple — a sacrifice from your inner circle. I will have my fun and, perhaps, forget your offence. To me... it is a small price to pay."

traits.locale_text: "Warum nicht? Ihr wusstet nicht zu schätzen, was ich Euch angeboten habe. Für diesen Affront müsst Ihr büßen. Meine Bitte ist simpel — ein Opfer aus Eurem innersten Kreis. Ich werde meinen Spaß haben und Eure Beleidigung vielleicht vergessen. Für mich ... ist das ein kleiner Preis."

languages.text: "Neden olmasın? Sana sunduklarımın kıymetini bilmeyi beceremedin. Bu ihlalini telafi etmelisin. Talebim gayet basit. Yakın çevrenden birini feda edeceksin. Ben keyfime bakar, belki de hakaretini unuturum. Benim için bu... Ödenecek ufak bir bedel."
languages.original_text: "Why not? You have failed to appreciate what I have offered you. You must make amends for your transgression. My request is very simple — a sacrifice from your inner circle. I will have my fun and, perhaps, forget your offence. To me... it is a small price to pay."

traits.locale_text: "Neden olmasın? Sana sunduklarımın kıymetini bilmeyi beceremedin. Bu ihlalinin telafisini yapmalısın. Talebim gayet basit. Yakın çevrenden birini feda edeceksin. Ben keyfime bakacağım ve belki de hakaretini unutacağım. Benim için bu... Ödenecek ufak bir bedel."
